actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1737.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of amounts paid from an estate as an allowance or award for the support of the decedent's surviving spouse or children.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the estate tax amounts paid out of an estate as an allowance or award for the support of the decedent's surviving spouse or children for a limited period during the administration of the estate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of amounts paid from an estate as an allowance or award for the support of the decedent's surviving spouse or children.
